channel.title: Facebook app that counts profile views
channel.description: Is it legit? http://apps.facebook.com/ncirrkj/d.php#access_token=189804741044866|9df9f7eb4c88f30189f1acd1-100000464714438|70a-N85bx7kOYD2i5cRQn-OFKmU&expires_in=0 It says for me.. Profile views:10287 Boys:10000 People who say they are girls but are really boys:200 Shemales:86 Girls:1"

I really doubt it’s real…

item.title: Facebook app that counts profile views
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:7, topic:381027”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=476843.msg3488391#msg3488391 date=1296776417]
I didn’t bother to click on the link because I thought it would of given me some kind of like website virus and posted things on the wall, so others would click on it or something.
[/quote]
You can veto it’s powers to post on your wall. And I think Facebook has to approve of the app before it’s allowed to be used by others.[/quote]
Well, when someone posted it on the news feed wall. It didn’t have a facebook part, as part of the URL.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook app that counts profile views
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

I didn’t bother to click on the link because I thought it would of given me some kind of like website virus and posted things on the wall, so others would click on it or something.

You can veto it’s powers to post on your wall. And I think Facebook has to approve of the app before it’s allowed to be used by others.

item.title: Facebook app that counts profile views
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Well at the moment all of these apps are a load of bullshit, but i’m sure that you can embed apps into a profile page and using the API you could easily save the users profile ID to a database every time they go onto the page.
This would count every view count since the addition of the app. Since you have everyone’s profile ID you can count how many friends, boys, girls etc are actually looking at your page.

Read full topic
item.source: Facebook app that counts profile views
